name: Steve's Adventure ([Bright_Kung])
description:
Steve on his way to save his family.
Is he gonna make it?
It's up to you!
Sacrifice your family for great power or save them and pay the price.



Credits: Background music: Sara Garrard
                   Most of the assets: PreukSuksiri

This is my first game ever made.
I hope you all have fun and enjoy.
